products.name: MacBook Pro
products.description: The ultimate pro notebook, MacBook Pro features faster processors, upgraded memory, the Apple T2 Security Chip, and a Retina display with True Tone technology.

products.name: Dell XPS 13
products.description: The Dell XPS 13 is a slim and powerful laptop with a 10th generation Intel Core processor, a 13.3-inch InfinityEdge display, and up to 16GB of RAM.

products.name: Logitech G Pro Mechanical Keyboard
products.description: The Logitech G Pro Mechanical Keyboard is designed for esports professionals and features a compact tenkeyless design, Romer-G switches, and customizable RGB lighting.

products.name: Corsair K95 RGB Platinum XT Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
products.description: The Corsair K95 RGB Platinum XT Mechanical Gaming Keyboard features Cherry MX Speed RGB Silver mechanical switches, per-key RGB backlighting, and six programmable macro keys.

products.name: LG 27GL83A-B UltraGear Gaming Monitor
products.description: The LG 27GL83A-B UltraGear Gaming Monitor features a 27-inch QHD IPS display, a 1ms response time, and NVIDIA G-SYNC compatibility.

products.name: Dell U2719D UltraSharp Monitor
products.description: The Dell U2719D UltraSharp Monitor features a 27-inch QHD IPS display with HDR support, a 60Hz refresh rate, and a slim bezel design.

products.name: IKEA ALEX Desk
products.description: The IKEA ALEX Desk is a sleek and functional desk with two drawers for storage and cable management solutions.

products.name: Fully Jarvis Bamboo Standing Desk
products.description: The Fully Jarvis Bamboo Standing Desk is a height-adjustable desk with a bamboo top, a programmable LED controller, and a sturdy steel frame.

products.name: LG 27GL83A-B Gaming Monitor
products.description: The LG 27GL83A-B Gaming Monitor features a 27-inch QHD IPS display, a 144Hz refresh rate, and Nvidia G-Sync compatibility for a smooth gaming experience.

products.name: Ducky One 2 Mini Mechanical Keyboard
products.description: The Ducky One 2 Mini Mechanical Keyboard is a 60% keyboard with Cherry MX switches, PBT keycaps, and customizable RGB lighting.

products.name: Acer Predator X27 Gaming Monitor
products.description: The Acer Predator X27 Gaming Monitor features a 27-inch 4K UHD display, G-Sync HDR technology, and a 144Hz refresh rate for an immersive gaming experience.

products.name: Uplift V2 Standing Desk
products.description: The Uplift V2 Standing Desk is a height-adjustable desk with a sturdy frame, a variety of desk top options, and a programmable controller for easy adjustments.

products.name: Vortexgear Pok3r Mechanical Keyboard
products.description: The Vortexgear Pok3r Mechanical Keyboard is a compact 60% keyboard with Cherry MX switches, PBT keycaps, and programmable layers.

products.name: Razer Blade Pro 17
products.description: The Razer Blade Pro 17 is a powerful gaming laptop with a 10th Gen Intel Core processor, NVIDIA GeForce RTX graphics, and a 17.3-inch 4K display with 120Hz refresh rate.

products.name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon
products.description: The Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon is a lightweight and durable laptop with a 10th Gen Intel Core processor, up to 16GB of RAM, and a 14-inch 4K display.

products.name: Corsair K70 RGB Mechanical Keyboard
products.description: The Corsair K70 RGB Mechanical Keyboard is a premium gaming keyboard with Cherry MX RGB switches, per-key backlighting, and a durable aluminum frame.

products.name: Logitech MX Keys
products.description: The Logitech MX Keys is a wireless keyboard with backlit keys, a USB-C rechargeable battery, and support for up to three devices at once.

products.name: LG 27GN950-B UltraGear Monitor
products.description: The LG 27GN950-B UltraGear Monitor is a 27-inch 4K gaming monitor with a 1ms response time, NVIDIA G-Sync compatibility, and a 144Hz refresh rate.

products.name: Dell UltraSharp 27 Monitor
products.description: The Dell UltraSharp 27 Monitor is a 27-inch 4K monitor with a USB-C port, HDR support, and a wide color gamut.

products.name: IKEA ALEX Desk
products.description: The IKEA ALEX Desk is a simple and functional desk with built-in storage compartments and a cable management system.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra is a flagship smartphone with a 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, a 108MP primary camera, and a 5,000mAh battery.

products.name: Apple iPhone 12 Pro Max
products.description: The Apple iPhone 12 Pro Max is a high-end smartphone with a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, a 12MP triple-camera system, and 5G connectivity.

products.name: OnePlus 9 Pro
products.description: The OnePlus 9 Pro is a premium smartphone with a 6.7-inch Fluid AMOLED display, a 48MP quad-camera system, and Warp Charge 65T fast charging.

products.name: Google Pixel 5
products.description: The Google Pixel 5 is a flagship smartphone with a 6.0-inch OLED display, a 12.2MP dual-pixel camera, and a 4,080mAh battery.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 4
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 is a smartwatch with a 1.4-inch Super AMOLED display, heart rate monitoring, and sleep tracking.

products.name: Apple Watch Series 7
products.description: The Apple Watch Series 7 is a smartwatch with a 1.8-inch Retina display, an always-on display, and fall detection.
